name: Viceland (Pre-Alpha)
description:
Viceland is a simple free-for-all deathmatch in which the player has to assert himself against his opponents with a single weapon. The player who has the most kills at the end of a round wins. A round ends after a desired time.

Release status: 
Prototype — An early prototype for testing an idea out, fate of project unknown
